venue.name: Davis Square-right in front of JP Licks

item.description:
Most of our rides start pretty far outside of Boston/Cambridge, so let's start this one in Davis Sq. From Davis Sq. we'll follow the minuteman trail out to Bedford then onto Concord. In Concord we can get a snack and then head back. Back in Davis square, let's hit Sacco's Bowl Haven for Pizza, Wine, Beer etc.

 

We'll meet at Davis Square proper, in from of JP Licks, at the corner of Elm and College, across from the T station.

 

The total distance of this ride is about 32 miles. We'll be traveling at 10-15 miles per hour on average. We'll stop at major turns and intersections to let everyone catch up. If we get a big turn out perhaps someone will volunteer to help me split the group up and lead half. I anticipate this ride taking 4 hours give or take.

Cyndi will co-lead a shorter ~20 mile ride within this ride, turning around in Bedford, MA.

Helmets are required!

Road bikes are recommended.
Bring also layers of bike clothing, those funny looking bike shorts, sun glasses, sun screen, water, energy food, water, drink, bike repair kit, spare bike tube, etc. etc.

Enjoy and looking forward to meeting you out there!
item.how_to_find_us: At the corner of Elm and College, across from the T station on the square in front of JP Licks.
item.name: City to Country ride (Davis SQ. to Concord, MA)
